author: Flame442
install_msg:
Thanks for installing monopoly. Use `[p]monopoly` to play.
This cog comes with bundled data.
name: Monopoly
description: Play a game of monopoly with members of your server, or against AI opponents. Generates an image to represent the board state. Many house rules can be configured to match any ruleset. Run [p]monopoly to play!
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user ids in order to identify the players in saved games.
